pageTitle: DNB Key Statistics - Dun & Bradstreet Corp. Financial Ratios - MarketWatch
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4681=Dun & Bradstreet Corp. is engaged in the business of collecting, maintaining and providing commercial business information. The company transforms commercial data into valuable insight which is the foundation of its global solutions that customers rely on to make critical business decisions. It provides an online database with information on public and private companies, executives and industries. The company operates through two segments: Americas and Non Americas. The Americas segment consists of operations in the United States, Canada and Latin America. The Non Americas Segment consists of operations United Kingdom, Netherlands, Belgium, Australia, Greater China, India and Worldwide Network. Dun & Bradstreet was founded on July 20, 1841 and is headquartered in Short Hills, NJ., 10569=Jul 31, 2015, 4:40 p.m.}
